detail_desc: Long T-shirt in hard-washed slub cotton jersey with raw, roll edges and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Longer at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and medium coverage at the back.
5-pocket jeans in superstretch washed denim with a regular waist and super-skinny legs.
Leather Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the top. Twill linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a sheen. High, elasticated waist. Lined.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a high waist, zip fly and straight, ankle-length legs.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, button fly, welt side pockets and a welt back pocket.
Oversized top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs with raw-edge hems.
Dungarees in washed stretch denim with adjustable straps and press-studs at the sides. Flap chest pocket with a fastener, side pockets, back pockets and slim legs with shaping seams at the knees.
V-neck jumper in fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in organic cotton piqué with a ribbed collar and two buttons at the top.
Baby Exclusive. Dungaree dress in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Straps with buttons at the front, elastication at the sides, a gathered seam at the waist and a skirt with patch pockets.
Mittens in a soft jacquard knit with ribbed cuffs. Thinsulate™ lining.
Double-layered hats in soft cotton jersey.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed denim with a high waist and short legs with cut-off hems.
Fitted dress in jersey with mesh sections at the top, long sleeves, a seam at the waist and slit at the back.
Top in soft slub cotton jersey with a motif on the front and round neckline with a narrow trim. Short dolman sleeves and a straight-cut hem with short slits in the sides.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Bottoms with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Fitted jumper in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with a polo neck, long sleeves and short slits in the sides.

Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit wool and recycled cashmere blend. V-neck, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with turn-ups at the cuffs. Ribbing around the neckline, down the button band and at the cuffs and hem.
Short dress in a patterned crêpe viscose weave with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Cut-out sections under the bust and a tie detail at the top. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft, stretch cotton jersey with a boat neck and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey with short slits at the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Plastic gift box containing five adjustable metal rings with various decorations.
Pouch bag in soft, transparent, printed plastic with a zip at the top. Size 22x32 cm.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Jacket in soft faux fur with a high collar, concealed press-studs down the front and side pockets. Lined.
Fine-knit tights with an elasticated waist.
Wide, high-waisted jeans in washed denim with a concealed zip at the front, detachable tie belt with loops at the waist, front and back pockets and straight legs that flare to the hem.
Soft faux shearling jacket with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and zipped chest pocket. Rounded and longer at the back. Fleece lining.
Short jersey dress in jacquard-knit jersey with short sleeves and a visible zip at the back. Unlined.
Short, sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with elastication and a frill trim at the top, narrow shoulder straps and an elasticated seam at the waist. Jersey lining.
Hat in a soft cable knit with a faux fur pompom and a ribbed, turned-up hem. Cotton jersey lining.
Short-sleeved dress in soft jersey with a seam and drawstring at the waist.
Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, side pockets and slim, tapered legs.
Clamdiggers in a cotton Oxford weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly with a button. Front pockets, back pockets and shaping seams at the knees.
Fitted vest top in soft cotton jersey with lace trims around the neckline and armholes.
Scarf in soft, rib-knit cashmere. Size 48x170 cm.
Gloves in a fine-knit wool blend with a Thinsulate™ lining.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey with a scalloped trim around the neckline and armholes.
Toe-post mules in crocodile-patterned leather. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 1.4 cm.
3/4-length leggings in soft jersey with an elasticated waist.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs.
Body in ribbed jersey with a low-cut back, long sleeves and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Short dress in soft jersey with a round neckline, long sleeves, seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.

Straight-cut shirt in a cotton weave with a soft, lightly brushed finish. Collar, buttons down the front and a chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with a turn-down collar and chest pocket. Easy-iron finish.
Top in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a round neckline and short butterfly sleeves with overlocked hems.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in supersoft, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Jumper in a soft knit with visible seams at the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbed roll edges at the cuffs and hem.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar and button placket. Long sleeves with gathers and buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Classic T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and a round, ribbed neckline.

Blouse in airy chiffon with a small frilled collar, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and flounces down the front that continue over the shoulders. Long sleeves with a seam at the top, narrow elastication and a decorative drawstring at the wrists, and a flare to the cuff. Unlined.

Trousers in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, pockets in the side seams and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems. Soft brushed inside.
Maxi skirt in a patterned viscose weave with a concealed zip in one side and flare to the hem. Unlined.
Cardigan in a soft rib knit with a round neckline, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Weekend bag in canvas with imitation leather details. Two handles and a zip at the top, two outer compartments, one with a zip and one zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 14x45x37 cm.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Loafers in a textured weave with a heart-shaped buckle at one side in metal decorated with sparkly stones. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel approx. 1 cm.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Socks in textured-knit cotton with rib-knit, fold-down shafts.

Short, A-line tunic in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, opening with ties at the neck and gathered yoke at the back. Gathered seam at the shoulders, long, voluminous sleeves with ties at the cuffs and a gathered seam at the waist with a drawstring. Unlined.
Coat in a wool blend with notch lapels and dropped shoulders. Lined.
Cardigan in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, diagonal zip at the front and side pockets. Ribbed cuffs and a raw-edge hem.
Skinny-fit jeans in soft, superstretch denim for maximum mobility with worn and embroidered details. Adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets, and raw-edge hems.
Fitted turtleneck top in soft lace made from a cotton blend with long sleeves.
Sunglasses with concealed frames and angular, UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, pockets in the side seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Wide trousers in woven fabric with a zip fly and button, side pockets, fake back pockets and wide legs with a crease and tab with metal fastener at the hems.

Ankle-length trousers in twill with pleats at the front to create a relaxed fit. High waist, a zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and a low crotch. Diagonal side pockets, fake welt back pockets with a button, and gently tapered legs.
Bracelet in braided imitation leather and fabric with a magnetic metal fastener. Width approx. 1 cm.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Fitted jumper in a soft rib knit. Round neck with a metal press-stud, decorative metal buttons on one shoulder and long raglan sleeves.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a gentle V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a smocked back. Seam at the waist and a gently bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Tailored shorts in an airy weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a fake back pocket.
Short-sleeved dress in soft slub cotton jersey with a print motif. Short cap sleeves, a braided detachable belt in imitation suede and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Short-sleeved shirt woven in a cotton blend with a turn-down collar, French front and rounded hem. Slim Fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and narrow trim around the neckline. Concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
